title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 12 categories on the x axis representing Oil Spill Event, and Amount of leaked oil (in tons) in each Oil Spill Event on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) where Amount of leaked oil (in tons) is 1000000.0.
The lowest category is found at Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker) where Amount of leaked oil (in tons) is 20000.0.
The highest value at Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) is almost 50.0 times larger than the minimum value of Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker).
The highest value at Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) is almost 50.0 times larger than the minimum value of Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker).
The difference between the max Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) and min Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker) is 980000.0.

data.Oil Spill Event: Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig)
